word:
Let them learn how to gain control of self, how to work together in love and harmony, how to conquer difficulties. Let them strive for sweetness of temper. This is a grace that the Lord Jesus will highly commend. If they learn these lessons, they will have gained a grand victory.--Letter 136, 1903, p. 3. (To W. C. White, July 8, 1903.) 

Released August 20, 1973.
